price: 2. Rasuul (Muxammad) ka socda xagga Alle oo akhriyaya waraaqo daahir ah.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
